channel.title: [DELTA] A few questions
channel.description:
So I've been working on a Delta server for close to 2-3 months now. I can't seem to figure out how to :
-Make NPCs aggresive -Make pray less effective againest certain NPCs and, -[s]Make a certain area a multi zone[/s]
If anyone has a link to a Tutorial or can tell me how to complete the above tasks, it would be greatly appreciated.
-Supman/Justin

item.title: [DELTA] A few questions
item.dc:creator: @Supman326 Supman326
item.description:
@Supman326 wrote:

I went through that already, twice only found one tutorial which will somewhat help with making a multizone

Read full topic
